TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRequestChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
type IRequestChannel = interface interface IChannel interface ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 定义一个协定，通道必须实现该协定，才能成为消息传递终结点之间的请求-回复通信的请求端。

span.span: Defines the contract that a channel must implement to be on the requesting side of a request-reply communication between messaging endpoints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义返回响应消息的 方法的同步和异步版本。The defines synchronous and asynchronous variants of a method that returns a response message. 它还提供了 和 属性来检索请求消息所发送到的终结点地址和 URI。It also provides a and properties to retrieve the endpoint address and URI to which the request message is sent.

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，将请求消息传送到请求-回复消息交换的回复端。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to transmit a request message to the reply side of a request-reply message exchange.

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，将请求消息传送到请求-回复消息交换的回复端。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to transmit a request message to the reply side of a request-reply message exchange.
The that references the asynchronous message transmission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果请求消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则将引发 。If the request message is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法。The following code shows how to implement this method. summary.span: 开始一个异步操作，在指定时间间隔内将请求消息传送到请求-回复消息交换的回复端。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to transmit a request message to the reply side of a request-reply message exchange within a specified interval of time.
The that references the asynchronous message transmission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果请求消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则应引发 。If the request message is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a should be thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. 如果在调用该函数时传入了 `timeout`，则使用该值。If a `timeout` is passed while calling the function then that value is used. 如果在绑定上设置了 ，那么，若是在调用该函数时未指定 `timeout`，则使用绑定上的该值。If the is set on the binding, then the value on the binding is used if no `timeout` is specified while calling the function. 如果在绑定上以及在调用该函数时未指定超时值，则使用 。The is used if no timeout is specified on either the binding or while calling the function. 此默认值为 1 分钟。This default value is 1 minute. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code shows how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_HttpCookieSession#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_httpcookiesession/cs/httpcookierequestsessionchannel.cs#3)]

span.para: 此操作应引发如果指定在操作完成之前超出。
The operation should throw a if the specified is exceeded before the operation is completed.

summary.span: 获取请求通道将消息发送到的远程地址。

span.span: Gets the remote address to which the request channel sends messages.

value.span: 请求通道将消息发送到的 。

span.span: The to which the request channel sends messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定 ， 将用作最终目标和物理地址。The serves as both the ultimate destination and the physical address if a is not specified. 如果已指定 ，则此地址为消息将要发送至的实际物理地址，且消息必须通过此地址到达目标。If the is specified, then that is the actual physical address to which the message is sent and through which the message must go to arrive at its destination. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此属性。The following code shows how to implement this property. [!code-csharp[S_UE_HttpCookieSession#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_httpcookiesession/cs/httpcookierequestsessionchannel.cs#0)]

summary.span: 发送一个基于消息的请求，并返回相关的基于消息的响应。

span.span: Sends a message-based request and returns the correlated message-based response.

span.span: The request to be transmitted.

summary.span: 发送一个基于消息的请求，并返回相关的基于消息的响应。

span.span: Sends a message-based request and returns the correlated message-based response.

returns.span: 在对请求的响应中收到的 。

span.span: The received in response to the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实现确保响应消息与请求消息相关联。Implementations of ensure that the response message is correlated with the request message. 通常，如果 的实现收到与未处理的请求无关联的消息，则丢弃该消息。Generally, if an implementation of receives a message that is not correlated to an outstanding request, it is dropped. 多个线程可并发调用 方法。The method can be called concurrently across multiple threads. 将消息传入请求通道将使该消息被访问。Passing the message into the request channel causes the message to be accessed. 在调用 后，就再也不能检查消息或对消息调用 。After you call , you can no longer inspect the message or call on the message. 如果请求消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则将引发 。If the request message is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法：The following code shows how to implement this method: [!code-csharp[S_UE_HttpCookieSession#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_httpcookiesession/cs/httpcookierequestsessionchannel.cs#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实现确保响应消息与请求消息相关联。Implementations of ensure that the response message is correlated with the request message. 通常，如果 的实现收到与未处理的请求无关联的消息，则丢弃该消息。Generally, if an implementation of receives a message that is not correlated to an outstanding request, it is dropped. 多个线程可并发调用 方法。The method can be called concurrently across multiple threads. 将消息传入请求通道将使该消息被访问。Passing the message into the request channel causes the message to be accessed. 在调用 后，就再也不能检查消息或对消息调用 。After you call , you can no longer inspect the message or call on the message. 如果请求消息大于使用的绑定所允许的最大消息大小，则将引发 。If the request message is larger that the maximum message size allowed by the binding being used, a is thrown. 最大消息大小由 属性设置。The maximum message size is set by the property. 默认值为 65536 字节。The default value is 65536 bytes. 如果在调用该函数时传入了 `timeout`，则使用该值。If a `timeout` is passed while calling the function then that value is used. 如果在绑定上设置了 ，那么，若是在调用该函数时未指定 `timeout`，则使用绑定上的该值。If the is set on the binding, then the value on the binding is used if no `timeout` is specified while calling the function. 如果在绑定上以及在调用该函数时未指定超时值，则使用 。The is used if no timeout is specified on either the binding or while calling the function. 此默认值为 1 分钟。This default value is 1 minute. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现此方法。The following code shows how to implement this method.
